snippet: BAILLIERE--Thomas Henry Gaither, Jr. On January 17, 2016, Thomas Henry Gaither Bailliere, Jr., of Poplar Hill, MD, beloved husband of Anne (nee Dobbin) Bailliere; devoted father of Elisabeth Bailliere Dean and her husband Christopher, Alexandra Bailliere and her husband Allan Treadwell; loving grandfather of Eliza, Diana and Nicholas Dean, Thomas, James and William Treadwell. Also survived by nine nieces and nephews. A funeral service will be held 11am, Friday at The Church of the Redeemer, 5603 N. Charles Street, Baltimore, MD 21210. Interment private. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions in Tom's name may be made to Johns Hopkins University, c/o Fund for Johns Hopkins Medicine, Attn: Project RESTORE in the Department of Neurology, 550 N. Broadway 7th Floor, Suite 731, Baltimore, MD 21205 or Baltimore Symphony Orchestra, Attn: Development, 1212 Cathedral Street, Baltimore, MD 21201. Memory tributes may be sent to the family at www.evans funeralchapel.com 1/3
